title: Canada euthanasia now accounts for nearly one in 20 deaths
dot:
digraph euthanasia_canada{node[shape=rectangle, style=rounded, fontsize=12, width=2.5];rankdir=LR;main[label="Medically-Assisted Dying in Canada (2023)" shape=ellipse width=1.5]; figures[label="Key Figures
- 4.7% of deaths (2023)
- 15,300 assisted deaths
- 320,000 total deaths" shape=box];demographic[label="Demographics
- Median age: 77+
- 96% terminal illnesses
- 96% white, 1.8% East Asian" shape=box];legal[label="Legal Framework
- Legal since 2016
- Eligibility criteria: severe medical condition
- Two healthcare providers must confirm" shape=box];provinces[label="Provincial Trends
- Quebec: 37% of assisted deaths
- Ontario concerns about safeguards" shape=box];international[label="International Comparisons
- Netherlands: 5% of deaths
- UK: pending legislation
- Other countries: Australia, New Zealand, Spain, Austria" shape=box];controversies[label="Controversial Cases
- Cases of non-terminal conditions
- People with disabilities considering assisted death" shape=box];expansion[label="Expansion of Access
- 2021: Chronic illness
- 2023: Mental illness delay" shape=box];main->figures;main->demographic;main->legal;main->provinces;main->international;main->controversies;main->expansion; legal->"Assisted dying for non-terminal conditions
 (chronic illness, mental illness)";provinces->"Quebec: higher usage rate
 (37% of deaths, 22% of population)";controversies->"Cases of people with disabilities
 seeking euthanasia due to housing issues";}

title: Rules that terminal programs follow
dot: digraph TerminalInteraction{rankdir=TB;node[shape=box];OperatingSystem[label="Operating System"];Shell[label="Shell"];TerminalEmulator[label="Terminal Emulator"];Program[label="Running Program (e.g., top, vim, cat)"];subgraph cluster_1{label="Components of Terminal Interaction";style=dashed;OperatingSystem;Shell;TerminalEmulator;}subgraph cluster_2{label="Program Behavior Rules";style=dashed;Rule1[label="Rule 1: Ctrl-C quits noninteractive programs"];Rule2[label="Rule 2: TUIs quit with 'q'"];Rule3[label="Rule 3: REPLs quit with Ctrl-D on empty line"];Rule4[label="Rule 4: Use no more than 16 colors"];Rule5[label="Rule 5: Support readline keybindings"];Rule5_1[label="Rule 5.1: Ctrl-W deletes last word"];Rule6[label="Rule 6: Disable colors when writing to a pipe"];Rule7[label="Rule 7: '-' means stdin/stdout"];Learning[label="Learning these rules takes time"]; Rule1->Rule2;Rule2->Rule3;Rule3->Rule4;Rule4->Rule5;Rule5->Rule5_1;Rule5_1->Rule6;Rule6->Rule7;Rule7->Learning;}OperatingSystem->Shell;Shell->TerminalEmulator;TerminalEmulator->Program;Program->Rule1;Program->Rule2;Program->Rule3;Program->Rule4;Program->Rule5;Program->Rule6;Program->Rule7;}
